job.title: Computer Vision / Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>You will join the Optical Engineering team, building customized solutions for the characterization of display, camera and touch technology for a well known product line up.</p><p>In this role, you will design and develop computer vision and machine learning based solutions, for automatic optical inspection and calibration of displays and cam- eras used in clients future products.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Description</strong></p><p>You will be directly responsible for developing automatic optical inspection and calibration of the end clients products, working with teams of amazing engineers and scientists.</p><p>Design, develop and optimize CV and ML based solution, for automatic optical in- spection and calibration.</p><p>Collaborate closely with optical instrumentation scientists, software engineers and system design engineers, to develop and deploy mass-production friendly metrology solutions for the clients products.</p><p>Work with cross-functionally teams to define metrology coverage and calibration specifications. Develop and validate corresponding CV/ML algorithm during new product introduction (NPI) cycle.</p><p>Study and improve metrology algorithm vs visual inspection correlation.</p><p>Analyze large amounts of NPI data to qualify/upgrade algorithm design.</p><p>Review algorithms from cross functional teams and third parties.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements</strong></p><ul><li>3+ years of related professional experience.</li><li>Deep knowledge and hands on experience on image processing and computer vision, including spatial/frequency domain analysis, geometric transform, feature detection, registration, segmentation, object detection and classification, etc.</li><li>Experience on machine learning, including SVM, CNN, and unsupervised machine learning, for image segmentation/classification.</li><li>Proficient in one or more of the following: C++/Python/Matlab/OpenCV/CUDA.</li><li>Proficient in at least one machine learning framework: Keras/Pytorch/TensorFlow, etc.</li><li>Good team player, self motivated and responsible.</li><li>A positive outlook towards stepping into uncharted technology space and working hard to deliver solutions in a timely fashion.</li><li>Experience on data analysis and visualization using Matlab/Python/JMP is a plus.</li><li>Excellent written and interpersonal skills; clear communication with diverse teams.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Desired Skillsets</strong></p><ul><li>Strong in C++ CV algorithm programming, profiling, and optimization.</li><li>Proficient of complete ML development including training, validation, deployment, evaluation and continuous upgrade.</li><li>Experience on developing CV and ML solution for manufacturing metrology/bio- medical imaging/related fields.</li><li>Experience on transfer learning, small labeled data, GAN, etc.</li><li>Experience on camera calibration, geometric registration, distortion correction, image rectification, multi-view geometry for industrial vision system.</li><li>Experience on complex mathematical optimization problems.</li><li>Knowledge on image quality metric (IQA).</li><li>Experience of cross-functional collaboration and project leadership.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Education</strong></p><p>MS/PhD in CS/EE/Imaging Science + 3 years experience.</p><p><br></p><p> Location: Cupertino, CA</p><ul><li>Duration: 6-12 months</li></ul>
